panels.title: Sessions
panels.description: Sessions shows the number of iSCSI clients currently logged in to the gateway group

panels.title: Defined Capacity
panels.description: Capacity refers to the total capacity defined within the iSCSI gateway group, and available to iSCSI clients

panels.title: IOPS
panels.description: Total IOPS across all iSCSI gateways

panels.title: Throughput
panels.description: Total read/write throughput across all iSCSI gateways
